title: Dai-chan, Daisuki.
synopsis: Main character in this film, Mai, has a handicapped brother, who is totally deaf, called Dai-Chan. He is like a younger brother for Mai yet he is actually her older brother because Dai-Chan always asks Mai to hold him up with smiling all over.
staff: [['Yamamoto, Youko', ['Director', ' Screenplay']], ['Shimizu, Katsunori', ['Sound Director']], ['Oshima, Michiru', ['Music']], ['Tada, Kikuko', ['Art Director']]]
